recommendations: ‚ÄúRajan worked with me in two companies during my time at Reliance and Myntra. His knowledge and experience in the eCommerce business was a huge asset to the Mynta Private brands. He was meticulous in organizing the buying and merchandising processes. He is fantastic at his job! He is very good at absorbing information. He knows how to work with people in other departments, goes above and beyond to help colleagues, and gets things done. He makes certain that everyone is on the same page and is focused on the main goal. I wish him the best of luck in his future endeavors. Also, wish to work with him again in future ‚Äù Show less
